txt.en: 'There is danger to the west, [placeholder]. Scorpions from Dûlagig have been expanding outward, harassing many local travellers. They are a danger to all the people of Urmâkh. These scorpions need to be culled, their numbers reduced. We require your help. Please, destroy their burrows, set them ablaze, and cull any scorpions you find.'
You have defeated the scorpions and destroyed their burrows. Return with the scout to Udlanu in Urmâkh with this report.
There is no twist in this mission.
Your mission is to go to Dûlagig, seal the scorpion burrows with fire and cull their number.
'Those scorpions were quite the threat to the people of Urmâkh. Thank you for ending their threat.'
'Your mission is clear, [placeholder]. Defeat the scorpions and set their burrows ablaze.'
Complete Mission: Kill It with Fire
Your mission is to go to Dûlagig, seal the scorpion burrows with fire and cull their number.\n\nSpeak to Udlanu to travel.
